data.title: Shop: Housewares & Decor
data.meta_description: Courage Fleece Throw Blanket Big 50″ x 60″ plush fleece throw blanket. Machine washable. “Courage is being scared to death but saddling up anyway.” (#232) $25.00 American Hero Throw Big 50″ x 60″ throw in coral plush fleece. Black and white design. (#206) $25.00 Fine Morning Throw Big 50″ x 60″ throw in coral plush ... Read more
data.text:
John Wayne “Man Who Shot Liberty Valance” Standup #1

With a rifle over his right shoulder, Wayne stands tall as Tom Doniphon in 1962’s classic The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance. Rugged corrugated cardboard with a full-color photo, and attached easel stand. Folds for easy storage and transportation. Due to the size of this item, shipping and handling costs for destinations within the U.S. are $40 each. Sorry, no international orders. (#214)

$32.00

John Wayne “Man Who Shot Liberty Valance” Standup #2

Draw, Mister! Tom Doniphon in 1962’s classic The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance is ready to fire, and is sure to “draw” attention! Brilliant full-color photo on heavyweight corrugated cardboard with an integrated easel stand. Folds for easy storage and transportation. Due to the size of this item, shipping and handling costs for destinations within the U.S. are $40 each. Sorry, no international orders. (#215)

$32.00

“El Dorado” Standup

True to life full-color photo on substantial corrugated cardboard with an attached easel stand for quick and simple display. Folds for storage and transportation. Due to the size of this item, shipping and handling costs for destinations within the U.S. are $40 each. Sorry, no international orders. (#216)

$32.00

John Wayne “True Grit” Standup

Life-size cardboard cutout standup is made of heavy cardboard with a high-quality image (John Wayne holding a rifle). An easel is attached so the cutout will be free-standing. Due to the size of this item, shipping and handling costs for destinations within the U.S. are $40 each. Sorry, no international orders. (#205)

$32.00

John Wayne “Hondo” Standup

Life-size cardboard cutout standup is made of heavy cardboard with a high-quality image (John Wayne holding a rifle). An easel is attached so the cutout will be free-standing. Due to the size of this item, shipping and handling costs for destinations within the U.S. are $40 each. Sorry, no international orders. (#204)

$32.00

John Wayne “A Man’s Got To Do” Tin Sign

One of John Wayne’s most popular quotes adorn this weathered-look metal sign: “A man’s got to do what a man’s got to do.” Holes are drilled at the corners for easy mounting. 12-1/2″ w x 16″ h. (#217)

$15.00

John Wayne Courage Tin Sign #1

This worn and weathered-looking sign features Wayne and one of his best-known quotes: “Courage is being scared to death–but saddling up anyway” over his signature. Holes are drilled at the corners for easy mounting. 16″ w x 12-1/2″ h. (#219)

$15.00
